text: John Patrick Hopkins (October 29, 1858 - October 13, 1918) was an American politician. He was the mayor of Chicago, Illinois (1893â€“1895). He was a Democrat. Hopkins was born on October 29, 1858, in Buffalo, New York. He was never married. Hopkins died on October 13, 1918, in Chicago, Illinois from a flu, aged 59. ==References== Category:1858 births Category:1918 deaths Category:Deaths from influenza Category:Mayors of Chicago Category:Politicians from Buffalo, New York Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: John Patrick Hopkins
